siteMetadata.title: Product Hunt 热门
siteMetadata.author: Buzzing.cc
siteMetadata.description: 用中文浏览 Product Hunt 热门App，网站和产品

blogPost.excerpt: The best way to find out if your apartment is quiet before signing a lease is to hear from the people who lived there before you. Our site allows users to find apartments and read rating based solely on noise.
blogPost.body: The best way to find out if your apartment is quiet before signing a lease is to hear from the people who lived there before you. Our site allows users to find apartments and read rating based solely on noise.
blogPost.title: Echo - Find a quiet place to live
blogPost.author: Brett Myers

localize.description: 在签订租约之前，要想知道你的公寓是否安静，最好的办法就是听听你之前住在那里的人的意见。我们的网站允许用户仅根据噪音来查找公寓和阅读评级。
在簽訂租約之前，要想知道你的公寓是否安靜，最好的辦法就是聽聽你之前住在那裏的人的意見。我們的網站允許用戶僅根據噪音來查找公寓和閱讀評級。

previous.excerpt: Get smarter in just a few minutes every week. Read the key insights from your favourite books in minutes with our in-short summaries packed with actionable tips. P.s It's free to sign up!
previous.title: Readinshort - Read the key insights from your favourite books in minutes.

localize.description: 每周只需几分钟就能变得更聪明。在几分钟内阅读您最喜欢的书籍中的关键洞察力，我们的简短摘要中充斥着可行的提示。另外，注册是免费的！
localize.tagline: 在几分钟内阅读你最喜欢的书中的关键洞察力。

localize.description: 每週只需幾分鐘就能變得更聰明。在幾分鐘內閱讀您最喜歡的書籍中的關鍵洞察力，我們的簡短摘要中充斥着可行的提示。另外，註冊是免費的！
localize.tagline: 在幾分鐘內閱讀你最喜歡的書中的關鍵洞察力。

next.excerpt: Quick Calc is a simple and easy-to-use calculator which can be directly accessed from the menu bar with the click of a button.
next.title: Quick Calc - An elegant calculator for your menu bar.

localize.description: Quick Calc是一个简单易用的计算器，只需单击一个按钮，即可从菜单栏直接访问。
localize.tagline: 一个优雅的计算器，为您的菜单栏。

localize.description: Quick Calc是一個簡單易用的計算器，只需單擊一個按鈕，即可從菜單欄直接訪問。
localize.tagline: 一個優雅的計算器，爲您的菜單欄。
